channel.title: Job vacancy: DI Director of Data Use
channel.description:
### **Development Initiatives: Director of Data Use for Sustainable Development**
IATI Secretariat member, [Development Initiatives (DI)](http://devinit.org/working-with-us/vacancies/) is hiring a Director of Data Use, which is a full time, Permanent, based in Bristol, UK or Washington DC, US.
They are seeking a senior leader with experience of and passion for promoting transparency and accountability for better development outcomes. The successful candidate will join DI's team of directors and be a strategic thinker, keen to achieve change for those at risk of being left behind.
The successful candidate will have:
* Ten or more years of relevant professional experience in international development, open data organisations or government institutions * Experience working with government functions on the production and use of evidence * Excellent understanding of data for sustainable development, especially data and statistics on financial flows and poverty
Please read the full [role profile](http://devinit.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Director-of-Data-Use-for-Sustainable-Development.pdf) and apply by emailing your CV and cover letter to HR@devinit.org. For more information on working for DI, please visit [their website](http://devinit.org/working-with-us/vacancies/).
* Salary scale: £60,000–£65,000 per annum, depending on experience * Closing date: 28 September 2018, 5pm BST * First interviews: w/c 8 and 15 October 2018 * Start date: November 2018
